edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus
[Groovy] Class TokenizedAnalysisEditionGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.holycross.shot.hocuspocus.TokenizedAnalysisEditionGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
AnalyticalEditionGenerator
class TokenizedAnalysisEditionGenerator

Class implementing the AnalyticalEditionGenerator interface by tokenizing a text.

Property Summary

Character encoding to use for reading and writing files.
java.lang.Integer debug

java.lang.String derivedExtension

java.lang.String endBlockMarker

String to use as text value of token representing end of source editions' citation block.

String to use for null value in columns of tabular files.

java.lang.String tab

String to use when demarking columns of tabular files.
java.lang.String tokenEditionName

Name of file with tabular representation of tokenized edition.
java.lang.String tokenIndexName

Name of file with TTL statements mapping tokenized edition nodes to node of source edition.

Method Detail

formatLine

java.lang.String formatLine(java.lang.String baseUrn, java.lang.String prev, java.lang.String curr, java.lang.String nxt, java.lang.String tokenValue)
Formats a line for tabular representation of text.
returns:
A string in HMT project's tabular format.
Parameters:
baseUrn - URN of the citable node in the source edition.
i - Running index count for the node.

generate

void generate(java.io.File inputFile, java.lang.String separatorStr, java.io.File outputDirectory, java.lang.String outputFileName)

generate

void generate(java.io.File inputFile, java.lang.String separatorStr, java.io.File outputDirectory)
Generates a tokenized edition from a tabulated representation of a text. It creates the following artifacts in outputDirectory: - a file with the tabular representation of the tokenized edition - a file with TTL mapping the citable nodes of the token edition to the source edition.
Parameters:
inputFile - File with the tabular representation of the text.
separatorStr - String used to separate columns in the tabular file.
outputDirectory - A writable directory where output will be created.

getDescription

java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns a human-readable description of the system for generating token editions derived from and aligned with a source edition.

getUrnName

java.lang.String getUrnName()
